creator: rbowen@apache.org
text:
There is nothing particularly advanced about the topics discussed in http://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/rewrite/advanced.html

I would like to reorg the rewrite docs by topic, or category, rather than this artificial 'advanced' designation. I have some general categories in mind, but I need to get them written down somewhere.

So, this is a reminder to myself that I need to work on this (unless someone beats me to it).
